topic.title: An enhanced clone of zerotalk. Everyone can easily clone it in hello page.
topic.body:
---

[ZHIHU](/1Q9LrWv27gyToaqDXA2GF2ZSA6PhznX7z1/)

---

# Features:

- Search filed (speacial input word like `my` for all your own topics and `r` for rand showing topics)
- Easily create group for everyone
- Each group can have limitless small group
- Support optional file (torrent|png|jpg|jpeg|gif|mp3|aac|m4a|flac|mp4|flv|webm|pdf|zip|msgpack)
- Optional file can be easily attached by dragging and dropping, and the optional file is limitless. (unlike the 10MB~200MB limit for each file and 1GB limit for one user in zeroup)
- For picture, music, and video, it will be embeded into your zite naturally. 
- For outside source (picture, music, and video), it will show a flag.
- Any embed picuture, music, or video, will not be downloaded automatically. It will be downloaded only when you click it.
- The embeded picture and video can be adjusted by using `![](address =width_percentx100)` like `![](address =50x100)`
- Comments can be resorted by `votes`, `time`, or `emit`.
- Each topic link can easily be shared when click the username under topic

---

# More Features in Future.

---

# Anyway, [it](/1Q9LrWv27gyToaqDXA2GF2ZSA6PhznX7z1/) can be easily cloned by everyone.
